Body: Are there any techniques available today that would make it considerably easier to anyone attempting to translate it today (as if they were trying todo it for the first time)? Otherwise would the process be the same as it was for the first person who managed to translate it? Would computers be of use and if yes how?
Title: If the Rosetta stone were to be translated today, would the process be the same as used the first time?
